title: 50% Spamophile
content: There seems to be more on all forums. Typophile is choking on Spam.
author: Nick Cooke

comments.content:
Also see off-topic discussion at [http://typophile.com/node/120429](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416033910/http:/typophile.com/node/120429 "http://typophile.com/node/120429")

Don
